channel.title: American language
channel.description:
A series of talks by Mitford Mathews, editor of the Dictionary of Americanisms and lecturer in linguistics at the University of Chicago.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: More from the Dutch
item.description: The fifth program in this series continues to discuss the influence of Dutch upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: Dutch language--Influence on English.

item.title: The colonists go a-borrowing
item.description: The second program in this series, "The Colonists Go A-Borrowing," talks about the influence of Native Americans on colonists' language usage.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: English language--United States--Etymology.

item.title: Imported from France
item.description: The seventh program in this series discusses the influence of French upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: French language.

item.title: Further borrowing from the Indians
item.description: The third program in this series, "Further Borrowing from the Indians," continues to explore the influence that Native Americans had on the way colonists spoke English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: English language--United States--Foreign words and phrases--Indian.

item.title: The Spanish gift
item.description: The eighth program in this series discusses the influence of Spanish upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: Language and languages--Etymology

item.title: Americans as makers of words
item.description: The first program in this series talks about "Americans as Makers of Words."
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: English language--United States--Etymology.

item.title: A German contribution
item.description: The sixth program in this series discusses the influence of German upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: German language.

item.title: A word from the Dutch
item.description: The fourth program in this series discusses the influence of Dutch upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: Dutch language--Influence on English.

item.title: Words from all over
item.description: The final program in this series discusses the influence of various languages, like Eskimo and Chinook, upon American English.
item.dc:creator: Parrish, Thomas (Thomas D.)
item.dc:subject: Language and languages--Etymology
